summary: Male Imperial Warrior with Nord ancestory.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
This mod allows you to have Damian Lockhear and have him as a followe, He is found in Whiterun in the of Belethor General Goods store siting on a chair or bench next to the front entrance. To marry him just simply get a Amulet of Mara from the Priest in Riften (If you have one already and there is no option to marry him go to Riften and talk to the priest because you must talk to the priest to unlock the features of marrying people in Skyrim!) and once you are wearing it talk to him and you should see an option like \"Interested me?\" etc...
To have him follow you just choose the action \"Follow me. I need your help\"

How to install:
Install the file and copy/cut it into the Skyrim Data file
Or use the Nexus Mod Manager that should work

Mod does not require Dawnguard

Bugs:
There is currently no other bugs if anyone notices any leave me a message

Future Updates:
May add more Dialogues, possibly Quests, maybe have him help Belethor run the store or even a story behind him(top of the list)
Working on a Dawnguard addon version
author: Damian
